bug.question: I am small and crawl. I have six legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🔎 I am smaller than your hand.
🚶 I move on the ground.
🌱 I like to live outside.

bug.question: I make yummy honey. I can sting you. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am black and yellow.
🐝 I buzz when I fly.
🍯 I live in a hive.

bug.question: I am red with black spots. I am good luck. What am I?

hints.text: ⚫ My spots are black.
🔴 I am usually red.
🐞 Some people think I bring good luck.

bug.question: I hop around and eat plants. I am green. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I like to eat grass.
🐸 I am not a frog, but I can hop.
🦗 I make a chirping sound.

bug.question: I build big hills of dirt. I work with my friends. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am very small.
💪 I am very strong for my size.
🏡 I live in a colony underground.

bug.question: I fly around at night. I like bright lights. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I am attracted to light.
🌙 I only come out when it is dark.
🔥 You might see me around a campfire.

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar and then I fly. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I eat lots of leaves when I'm young.
🌈 I have pretty wings when I grow up.
🌸 I visit flowers.

bug.question: I have long legs and make a web. Some people are scared of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I catch food in my web.
🕷️ I have eight legs.
🏡 I live in your house, sometimes.

bug.question: I can walk on water. I am long and thin. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I use surface tension to move
🚶 I look like I am walking on top of the water.
🏞️ You can find me on ponds and lakes.

bug.question: I am a shiny beetle that can roll dung into a ball. What am I?

hints.text: 💩 I eat dung.
🏐 I roll dung to make a ball.
🌍 I live in Africa and other warm places.

ocean.question: I wiggle and swim. I am small and orange. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 I live in the water.
🥕 My color is like a carrot.
🫧 I go 'glub glub'.

ocean.question: I have a shell and move very slow. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I leave a slimy trail.
🏠 I carry my house on my back.
🥬 I like to eat lettuce.

ocean.question: I am big and blue. Fish swim in me. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I am made of water.
🚢 Boats float on me.
🐳 Whales live in me.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I can squirt ink.
🖐️ I have lots of arms to hug with!
🌊 I live in the ocean.

ocean.question: I am a home for many fishes. I am very colorful. What am I?

hints.text: 🧱 I am made of tiny animals.
🐠 Fish like to hide in me.
🌈 I come in lots of pretty colors.

ocean.question: I have a big tail and jump out of the water. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐬 I make a clicking sound.
🌊 I love to swim in the ocean.
🗣️ People think I am very smart.

ocean.question: I am very big and I sing a long song. I swim in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am the biggest animal in the world!
🌊 I live in the ocean.
🎶 I make a very low sound that travels far.

ocean.question: I am a very flat fish that hides in the sand. What am I?

hints.text: 👀 Both of my eyes are on the same side of my head.
🌊 I live on the bottom of the ocean.
🏖️ I can blend in with the sandy bottom.

ocean.question: I have a hard shell and like to eat jellyfish. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I swim slowly in the sea.
🏖️ I lay eggs on the beach.
🌿 Some people think I am very old and wise.

ocean.question: I am a creature that has a beak like a bird and lays eggs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐧 I waddle when I walk.
🧊 I like to live in very cold places.
⚫ I am black and white and swim very well.
